PreceptDef.label: forbidden
PreceptDef.description:
People should never cheat on others.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - Pawns with this precept will not try to cheat or accept it naturally.

PreceptDef.label: discouraged
PreceptDef.description:
People should keep their pledge in most cases.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - (Initiator)Cheat chance -50% 
 - (Recipient)Cheat success chance -50%.

PreceptDef.label: encouraged
PreceptDef.description:
Love is chaotic and insane. Things will change, I am sorry for that.

<color=#E5E54C>Effect:</color>
 - (Initiator)Cheat chance +50% 
 - (Recipient)Cheat success chance +50%.
